subtitle: This is  a recipe that is cooked in the oven to perfection.

method.text: Mix together seasoned flour and five-spice seasoning in a bowl. Toss pork in flour to coat thoroughly.
Heat oil in wok and cook garlic and ginger for 30 seconds. Stir in pork and cook until browned. Gradually stir in pineapple juice and slowly bring to boil, stirring.
Transfer to casserole dish, cover and cook in oven for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days. Stir in remaining ingredients and return to oven for 15 min.

title: Chinese sweet 'n sour pork
